channel.title: AI Training on Brian Hengen's AI Experiments
channel.description: Recent content in AI Training on Brian Hengen's AI Experiments

item.title: Fine-Tuning a Personal Executive Assistant: Lessons from My Management Notes
item.description: How I fine-tuned IBM Granite 4.0 H Micro on 5+ years of management notes to create a personalized AI assistant—after three failures, the key was data quality.

item.title: Fine-Tuning Qwen Models: From Theory to Practice
item.description: Fine-tuning Qwen 32B and 14B models to create ChefBot—a cooking AI that outperforms general-purpose LLMs in the kitchen.
